title: Since May patch,When making a call, the other party cannot hear me unless I disconnect and call back
content:
I have tried
Restarting
When I place a call the other party cannot hear me, unless I hang up and call back. The microphone works for assistant and other tasks no problem, support has not been much help but what I have done is below.

Clearing phone app cache
Uninstalling phone app updates
Turning off Bluetooth
Making a call with Bluetooth
Running in safe mode
Calling on and off WiFi
Factory resetting my phone.

The interesting thing is this started last week when the new patch dropped, and when I factory reset my phone, before updating to the new patch it worked perfectly. Is anyone else having this issue?
